facilitation.title: Facilitation
facilitation.description: Designing workshops and programmes that create spaces for growth and discovery

currently.title: Currently
currently.paragraph1: I'm working at the University of Oxford's entrepreneurship service, supporting the growth of entrepreneurial talent and ecosystems whilst simultaneously building social impact organisations as Founder of Oxford Hongkongers CIC and Director of a Hong Kong-based charity foundation.
currently.paragraph2: With a background in Counselling & Psychology, I bring a human-centred approach to career development and entrepreneurship, currently deepening my expertise through an MSc in Business Psychology and MA in Career Development whilst holding professional certifications as an NCDA Career Services Provider (CCSP) and Global Career Development Facilitator (GCDF).

featuredIn.title: Sharing Insights On
featuredIn.subtitle: Social innovation, community building, and cross-cultural dialogue

partners.title: Partners & Collaborations
partners.subtitle: Working with organisations to create meaningful impact

cta.title: Let's Work Together
cta.description: Whether you're seeking career clarity or building something new, I'd love to hear from you

hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: I help individuals discover agency through career clarity and entrepreneurial thinking
hero.description: Based at the University of Oxford, I design transformative learning experiences that empower people to turn ideas into impact.
hero.name: I am Diana Lee
hero.intro: With over a decade of experience across higher education and the NGO sector,
hero.mission: I design transformative learning experiences that empower people to turn ideas into impact.
hero.roles: I'm a Career Development Facilitator • Enterprise Educator • Social Innovator, currently working at the University of Oxford's entrepreneurship service.

story.paragraph1: I'm Diana Lee, a Career Development Facilitator • Enterprise Educator • Social Innovator currently working at the University of Oxford's entrepreneurship service.
story.paragraph2: With over a decade of experience across higher education and the NGO sector—including my time at HKUST's Entrepreneurship Centre—I've designed initiatives that empower youth and aspiring founders to turn ideas into impact.
story.paragraph3: I'm also Founder of Oxford Hongkongers CIC, Director of a Hong Kong-based charity foundation, and currently pursuing an MSc in Business Psychology and MA in Career Development.

certifications.title: Professional Certifications
certifications.ccsp: NCDA CCSP – Certified Career Services Provider

philosophy.title: How I Work
philosophy.quote: Career development and entrepreneurship are not linear ladders—they are evolving journeys shaped by identity, context, and courage.
philosophy.theoryInformedDesc: Grounded in career development theory and business psychology
philosophy.experienceDrivenDesc: Practical exposure to startups and ecosystems
philosophy.tagline2: I design environments where people discover agency.

experience.mymailboxDesc: Founder | Organisation promoting wellness with over 10,000 users

cta.title: Let's Connect

hero.title: Services
hero.subtitle: Integrating psychology + entrepreneurship + facilitation + experiential design

careerFacilitation.title: 1:1 Career Facilitation
careerFacilitation.description: Personalized sessions for career clarity and direction. Combining psychology, structured reflection, and practical strategy—moving beyond advice into actionable clarity.

startupCoaching.title: 1:1 Startup Coaching
startupCoaching.description: One-on-one guidance for aspiring founders and early-stage entrepreneurs navigating their entrepreneurial journey.

workshops.title: Training & Workshops
workshops.description: Interactive, research-informed training for universities, schools, NGOs, and organisations. As a certified Personality Dimensions® Facilitator, I integrate behavioural insights into career and entrepreneurship education.

groupFacilitation.title: Group Facilitation & Cohort Programmes
groupFacilitation.description: Small-group learning experiences integrating peer dialogue, guided reflection, and experiential exercises for teams and cohorts.

gameBased.title: Game-Based Learning
gameBased.description: Experiential board games that make career development and entrepreneurship tangible through structured gameplay and reflection.

ecosystem.title: Programme & Ecosystem Development
ecosystem.description: Supporting institutions in designing entrepreneurship and career development initiatives through strategic planning and ecosystem building.

hero.title: Resources & Insights
hero.subtitle: Free tools, guides, and reflections on career development and entrepreneurship

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Let's explore how we can work together

form.title: Send a Message
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.

info.title: Contact Information
info.responseText: I typically respond to inquiries within 2-3 business days. For urgent matters, please indicate this in your message subject.
